name: IRBESARTAN

indications.text: irbesartan angiotensin ii receptor blocker ( arb ) indicated : treatment hypertension , lower blood pressure . lowering blood pressure reduces risk fatal nonfatal cardiovascular events , primarily strokes myocardial infarctions . ( 1.1 ) treatment diabetic nephropathy hypertensive patients type 2 diabetes , elevated serum creatinine , proteinuria . ( 1.2 )

contraindications.text: indication dose hypertension ( 2.2 ) 150 300 mg daily diabetic nephropathy ( 2.3 ) 300 mg daily

warningsAndPrecautions: irbesartan tablets , usp 75 mg available white off-white , round , flat beveled edge tablets , debossed “ ce ” one side “ 283 ” side . bottles 30 tablets – ndc 62135-976-30 bottles 90 tablets – ndc 62135-976-90 irbesartan tablets , usp 150 mg available white off-white , round , flat beveled edge tablets , debossed “ ce ” one side “ 284 ” side . bottles 30 tablets – ndc 62135-977-30 bottle 90 tablets – ndc 62135-977-90 irbesartan tablets , usp 300 mg available white off-white , oblong , standard concave tablets , debossed “ ce ” one side “ 285 ” side . bottles 30 tablets – ndc 62135-978-30 bottle 90 tablets – ndc 62135-978-90 store 20° 25°c ( 68° 77°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] .
adverseReactions: irbesartan tablets contraindicated patients hypersensitive component product . coadminister aliskiren irbesartan tablets patients diabetes .
indications_original: Irbesartan is an angiotensin II receptor blocker (ARB) indicated for: Treatment of hypertension, to lower blood pressure. Lowering blood pressure reduces the risk of fatal and nonfatal cardiovascular events, primarily strokes and myocardial infarctions. ( 1.1 ) Treatment of diabetic nephropathy in hypertensive patients with type 2 diabetes, an elevated serum creatinine, and proteinuria. ( 1.2 )
contraindications_original: Indication Dose Hypertension ( 2.2 ) 150 to 300 mg once daily Diabetic Nephropathy ( 2.3 ) 300 mg once daily
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Irbesartan Tablets, USP 75 mg are available as white to off-white, round, flat beveled edge tablets, debossed with
 
  “CE”on one side and
 
  “283”on the other side.

 
                  Bottles of 30 tablets – NDC 62135-976-30
                  Bottles of 90 tablets – NDC 62135-976-90
                  Irbesartan Tablets, USP 150 mg are available as white to off-white, round, flat beveled edge tablets, debossed with
 
  “CE”on one side and
 
  “284”on the other side.

 
                  Bottles of 30 tablets – NDC 62135-977-30
                  Bottle of 90 tablets – NDC 62135-977-90
                  Irbesartan Tablets, USP 300 mg are available as white to off-white, oblong, standard concave tablets, debossed with
 
  “CE”on one side and
 
  “285”on the other side.

 
                  Bottles of 30 tablets – NDC 62135-978-30
                  Bottle of 90 tablets – NDC 62135-978-90
                  Store at 20° to 25°C (68° to 77°F) [See USP Controlled Room Temperature].
adverseReactions_original:
Irbesartan tablets are contraindicated in patients who are hypersensitive to any component of this product.
                  Do not coadminister aliskiren with irbesartan tablets in patients with diabetes.
